issue.title: Gazebo real time factor falls to 0.0 in srcsim 0.6

content.raw: @nkoenig we are facing a similar issue when we open the door handle in task3. How can that be reset to a point where the door handle is open? This error occurs more than 80% of the time and we can help provide debug logs if required but will need some support in generating those logs as well.
content.html: @nkoenig we are facing a similar issue when we open the door handle in task3. How can that be reset to a point where the door handle is open? This error occurs more than 80% of the time and we can help provide debug logs if required but will need some support in generating those logs as well.
